fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select two players and swap their roles.
- Select a player and change their role to one of the same alignment and subalignment.
- Select a player and change their role into a completely random role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can't self target.
- Your targets are **not** told why their role was changed.
- Your ability is stopped by conversion immunity.
- You don't know the outcome of your ability, or if it fails or succeeds.
- If you switch an Unseen with a Town, the initial Unseen will become the Unseen version of the role, and the initial Town will become the Town version of the role. You may not target the Mastermind or Assassin.
